Our Services

Air Freight

At GKS Logistics, your air shipments are faster, safer and more cost-effective. We put our expertise and global network at your service for flawless air logistics.

24/7
10+ countries
Free Quote Read More

Sea Freight

Thanks to our efficient transportation network and presence in West Africa, we ensure effective local, regional and international delivery according to your country (Express and Standard delivery).

24/7
10+ countries
Free Quote Read More

Land Transport

Thanks to our expertise and regional network in West Africa, we offer secure and fast road transport services meeting our clients' requirements; ensuring rapid and efficient delivery of goods.

24/7
10+ countries
Free Quote Read More

Warehousing & Distribution

We offer modern, secure and strategic warehousing solutions to optimize your inventory management and supply chain. Our adapted infrastructure and expertise guarantee efficient and cost-effective management of your goods, whether short or long-term storage.

24/7
10+ countries
Free Quote Read More

Customs Transit

Thanks to our SME logistics solution, enjoy an economical, fast, and secure service for your shipments. Optimization of transport costs with regular shipments to Bamako, guaranteeing optimal delivery times. Handling of customs formalities in Bamako with complete security and traceability of your goods.

24/7
10+ countries

Our Philosophy

The principles that guide every action we take.

Our Vision

To become, by 2027, the leader in logistics solutions nationally and an international reference.

Our mission is to provide fast, secure logistics solutions tailored to our clients' needs nationally and internationally.

Our Strategic Priorities

1

Continuously listen to our clients to provide quality logistics, always aligned with their expectations and needs.

2

Support our clients toward success by offering a high-performance logistics chain.

3

Continue our consolidation efforts to provide high-value-added logistics.

4

Preserve our commitment to our employees and clients by retaining our human resources.

5

Develop a culture of excellence and performance.

6

Optimize our value chain through innovation and adoption of new technologies.

Our Logistics Process

An end-to-end experience...

1

Pickup

Express pickup at your door with real-time tracking from the first kilometer

2

Warehousing

Secure storage in our certified facilities with climate control

3

Transport

Optimized multimodal transport to more than 180 global destinations

4

Customs Clearance

Express processing of formalities with our team of certified experts

5

Delivery

Confirmed receipt with electronic signature and instant notification
